alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 4:44AM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches with locally higher amounts over 2 feet possible. Winds gusting 50 to 60 mph mainly above 9500 feet. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
